Name: Dakar
Description: Dakar is the capital and largest city of Senegal. It is known for its vibrant culture, historical significance, and coastal beauty.

Name: Thies
Description: Thies is the third-largest city in Senegal, located in the western part of the country. It serves as a key commercial and transport hub.

Name: Kaolack
Description: Kaolack is a city located in central Senegal and is an important regional trade center, particularly for groundnuts.

Name: Ziguinchor
Description: Ziguinchor is located in the southern part of Senegal, near the Casamance River, and is known for its beautiful landscapes and diverse culture.
